verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is like Him, The Lion and the Lamb Seated on the throne Mountains bow down every ocean roars To the Lord of Hosts{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise Adonai, from the rising of the sun â€˜Til the end of every day Praise Adonai, all the nations of the earth All the angels and the saints sing praise{/lang-eng}
